Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)

panels.description:
Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)

https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/blob/main/receiver/hostmetricsreceiver/internal/scraper/loadscraper/documentation.md
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr:
sum(system_paging_usage_bytes { k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name", state="used" })
/
sum(system_paging_usage_bytes { k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name"})

sum (irate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name", state="system"}[$__rate_interval])) 
/
sum ((irate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum (irate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{kk8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name", state="user"}[$__rate_interval])) 
/ 
sum ((irate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum(irate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name", state!~".*irq", state!="idle", state!="user", state!="wait", state!="system"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum ((irate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(host_name) (irate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name", state="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) 
/ 
on(host_name) group_left sum by (host_name)((irate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.expr: sum by(device) (rate(system_network_io_bytes_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name", job="", direction="transmit"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(device) (rate(system_network_io_bytes_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"${node_name}", host_name=~"$host_name", job="", direction="receive"}[$__rate_interval]))

list.description:
When deploying PostgreSQL on Kubernetes, name of the Kubernetes cluster.  
For other deployments, select "All".
list.label: K8s Cluster
list.name: k8s_cluster_name

list.description:
When monitoring Kubernetes, name of the K8s node.
For other deployments, select "All".
list.label: K8s node
list.name: node_name
